# Aura of Cold, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Druid Spells|Druid 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 14]], [[BoXM 14th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius spherical emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Frostburn  (WotC), pg. 88

This spell functions exactly like *[[Aura of Cold, Lesser (Spell)|lesser aura of cold]]**,* except it deals 2d6 points of cold damage to all creatures within 10 feet.
